company_description: Spendesk is a spend management platform that helps businesses manage expenses, track budgets, and streamline the purchasing process through virtual cards, expense reports, and approval workflows.
founders: Jordane Giuly, Rodolphe Ardant, Thibaud Elziere
embedding_text: Spendesk is a spend management platform that helps businesses manage expenses, track budgets, and streamline the purchasing process through virtual cards, expense reports, and approval workflows.
